PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_OpeningElementCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to the definition of all instances of IfcOpeningElement.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1')

PropertyDef.Name: Purpose
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of the purpose for that opening, e.g. 'ventilation', 'access', etc.

PropertyDef.Name: FireExit
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether this object is designed to serve as an exit in the case of fire (TRUE) or not (FALSE). Here whether the space (in case of e.g., a corridor) is designed to serve as an exit space, e.g., for fire escape purposes.

PropertyDef.Name: ProtectedOpening
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication whether the opening is considered to be protected under fire safety considerations. If (TRUE) it counts as a protected opening under the applicable building code, (FALSE) otherwise.

PropertyDef.Name: ParallelJambs
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicated, whether the jambs of an opening in a curved building element are intended to be parallel (TRUE) or are radial (FALSE). Radial means, that the extension of the jambs are rays through the axis of the revolution forming the curved building element.
